message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'll love. I'm asking for $12,000 for it, but I'm open to negotiating.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. That's still a good deal for you, and it gives us both a chance to make this work. What do you think?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $10,250. That's the best I can do.
